original_text: Also, the men stopped having sex with women. Instead, they strongly wanted to have sex with other men. Men did bad things with other men that they should be ashamed about. Because they did such wrong things, they received in their own bodies the punishment that was right.
korean_text: 그와 같이 남자들도 순리대로 여자 쓰기를 버리고 서로 향하여 음욕이 불 일듯 하매 남자가 남자와 더불어 부끄러운 일을 행하여 그들의 그릇됨에 상당한 보응을 그들 자신이 받았느니라

sentences.original_text: Also, the men stopped having sex with women
Instead, they strongly wanted to have sex with other men
sentences.korean_translation: 대신에, 그들은 다른 남자들과 성관계를 갖고 싶어했습니다

sentences.original_text: Men did bad things with other men
sentences.korean_translation: 남자들은 다른 남자들과 나쁜 일들을 했습니다

sentences.original_text: that they should be ashamed about
Because they did such wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그런 잘못된 일들을 했기 때문에

sentences.original_text: they received in their own bodies
